TopicTitle: Are you planing another discount for Kerbal SP?

Articles.Content:
I am planning to buy the game, (just watching the progress, while I am playing StarMade), but current price is 3 times high I can afford :-D

If you buy it on Steam at the moment it is 40% off. Not sure how long that deal's going on for, though.
